Containers.Name: SpeedTest
Containers.Description: Uses taganaka/SpeedTest script to test fiber internet speeds. [br][br] [b]SHORT_OUTPUT[/b] - set to true to enable the script to output only essential info[br] [b]SHARE[/b] - set to true to output the share image URL from speedtest.net[br] [b]SERVER[/b] - set to a specific server you want to test every time, or leave blank, see http://c.speedtest.net/speedtest-servers-static.php for a list[br]
Containers.Overview: Uses taganaka/SpeedTest script to test fiber internet speeds. Change or remove server in Dockerfile to your needs
